rows.label: qst201707_msg0001
rows.name:
U-Um... everyone... can
you wait a moment, sir?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0002
rows.name: What's wrong? You look pale...

rows.label: qst201707_msg0003
rows.name: Did Newt eat something bad, mo?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0004
rows.name:
I-I would never do such a
thing, sir! Please do not
lump me in with Tora-dono!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0005
rows.name: Then what's wrong?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0006
rows.name:
Well, it is a great honor to
meet His Majesty, but...

rows.label: qst201707_msg0007
rows.name:
The pressure of knowing I absolutely
must not make a mistake is...

rows.label: qst201707_msg0008
rows.name: What, are ye nervous?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0009
rows.name:
Newt, ye have a surprisingly
cute side to ye.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0010
rows.name: C-Cute?!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0011
rows.name:
What are you saying, sir?!
Please do not tease me, sir!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0012
rows.name: Special Inquisitor! Excuse me!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0013
rows.name: A messenger... What is it?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0014
rows.name: Regarding today's audience...

rows.label: qst201707_msg0015
rows.name:
His Majesty the Emperor will be
participating in training, so he
would like to postpone the audience.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0017
rows.name:
...So, does this mean I cannot meet
His Majesty the Emperor, sir?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0018
rows.name:
It cannot be helped. We will
have to come back another day.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0019
rows.name:
What a disappointment, sir...
I am so let down, sir...

rows.label: qst201707_msg0020
rows.name:
Um... Your appearance...
could you be Newt-san?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0021
rows.name:
That is correct, sir...
Is something the matter?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0022
rows.name: I knew it!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0023
rows.name:
Your bravery is known
even in Hadashal Palace!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0024
rows.name:
If it's not too much trouble, could
I shake your powerful hand?!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0025
rows.name:
Huh? A handshake, sir?
I don't mind, but...

rows.label: qst201707_msg0026
rows.name: Thank you!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0027
rows.name:
To be able to shake the
hand of the famously strong
Newt-san is an honor!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0028
rows.name: Um! Can I get a handshake too?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0029
rows.name: Me too, please!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0030
rows.name:
I've heard the rumors about
you! That you're the coolest
Blade there is!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0031
rows.name:
Newt-san, you are the pride
of the Superbian soldiers!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0032
rows.name: Is that so? I am the pride of Superbia!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0033
rows.name:
Aww, you're making me
blush, sirs! Ahahahaha!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0034
rows.name:
Ah! Please form a single
line for handshakes!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0035
rows.name:
Um... if you don't mind,
wouldn't you like to join the
training as well, Newt-san?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0036
rows.name: Me, sir?

rows.label: qst201707_msg0037
rows.name:
Yes. If everyone hears that
you are participating, their
morale will surely rise.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0038
rows.name:
...Well, but... I am
just a Blade, sir...

rows.label: qst201707_msg0039
rows.name:
There is no particular
reason to refuse.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0040
rows.name:
Yes, it would be a good
experience for us as well.
Let's participate together.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0041
rows.name: Really, sir?!

rows.label: qst201707_msg0042
rows.name: Then, I will handle the procedures.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0043
rows.name:
Please go to Nharil Central Plaza
and ask a soldier named Nabal for
the details of the operation.

rows.label: qst201707_msg0044
rows.name: Roger that, sir!
